text: Which of the following may be disqualified for evaluation

options.v: Adhere to an objective, neutral and rigorous review attitude
Be responsible for the review results and do not vote blindly
Vote cheating and damage the image of the DAO jury
Gracefully receive constructive feedback from the community

text: Which of the following complies with the SEER community building standards

options.v: Create a healthy and active use environment
Comply with Community Guidelines and Terms of Service

text: Which of the following is not a right owned by SEER DAO reviewers?
What are the prohibited activities that are not members of SEER DAO

options.v: Deceiving and misleading other community users, trying to steal sensitive account information of others
Attempts to impersonate the username of another user or individual
Help resolve issues encountered by community members
Demeans, tarnishes or otherwise harms the interests of the community
